Name: Providing local community boards and elected officials with advance notice of planned street closures.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing local community boards and elected officials with advance notice of planned street closures

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

Summary: This bill would require, when any agency other than the Department of Transportation plans to close a street or issues a permit to close a street, the head of the agency to notify the Commissioner of Transportation of such planned street closure. This bill would also require the Commissioner of Transportation to provide 72 hoursâ€™ advance notice to community boards and certain elected officials of all planned street closures within their districts.
